title: FSX - FS9 - Samoshin Natural World Winter

This package includes set of decisions to provide you a new (not realized before) winter features, such as the iced lakes and rivers, roofs under the snow etc. Seas and oceans could be iced near the coastline as well. Your winter in FS becomes more and more realistic! 
New Management utility now allows you to control both NW products (includes Trees 2.0) if it is installed.

Note! 
This product has some restrictions due to MSFS own technology. NW Winter is designed for local flights over iced and snowed terrain during winter season.
